channel.title: NPC talking to you when you make an account
channel.description:
Now, I have a question. ow would you make a certain NPC talk t you as soon as you start your account. Lets say:
I am A. A is new to the PV server. A makes his account for the first time. A NPC talks to A as soon as he logged in. After the chat, A logs out from a DC. A logs in again when it's resolved. A never see's the NPC again...

item.title: NPC talking to you when you make an account
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Repu:

You can save a “starter-talk” param in your character files and then check if the value is 0, and if it is then you can send up a simple npc dialogue from your npc dialogue class.

Its that easy? Thanks!
